data.text: Ɠizɛ è Ɓɛtɛ Nui zu, ɗa-nu niinɛlai zu,
Názu ɠa foloi ta wozakalagi ti wuu ɠa ɓidi la,
Názu ɠa pɛlɛ makɛ nuiti ti zu ɠa ɗa ɓali la,
Názu ɠa etea ʋɛlɛ ɓo felegɔiti ta ɗa vala da su,
Názu ɠa nu ɠa ɗa inɛinɛ da ga è ʋa lɛ ada zɛlɛgai,
aisa fufiligi ʋa ɠaaɠale ma pɔlɔi zu, ʋɛ seɠeai ná,
Tɛnɛbo Nui ɠɛ ma: «Wafuun faa ʋɛɛ wafuun faa ʋa,
É ɠula Tɛnɛbo Nui ná-ɠimalai ʋolu, é nuɓusɛiti kalani mɔnɔ ga nii é ɠɛni kwɛɛni. É tɛnɛ faalaalii ma mɔinmɔin kɛʋele ɓɛtɛni, kpegai ma ga ɠida ti-ʋoluʋɛti bu ga pagɔ.
É ɠaaɓaani é iɲɔdɔɔ ɓɔɛiti sɔlɔɔ, ta é gaama ɓɔɛ ɠiteɠitegiti sɛʋɛ.
Ɠima nuiti gooiti kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ kpaku ɠaazoɓagiti, ɗa ti kpein gaalɛɛna ba sɛʋɛ ɠila su, kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ kɔlu ɠaazoɓagiti, ti ɓadɔai. Naa kpein kulaʋɛ baala makɛ nu ɠila su.
Naa pɛ poluma, dòun zunu, mina ta wola ʋɛɛ ba. Nu ɠa zoo sɛʋɛi ɠɛɛzu ga mɔinɗa, kpela ge la ɠɛa ba, kala mɔinmɔin bo fai ɓalaa ka ga kpɔlɔi nui ʋɛ.
Ade woilo niima ɓɔɛzuɠulai kpein gaaɓelasuʋɛ ma:
Mazɔlɔɔ GALA ka ʋaazu kɛɛwotiiti kpein tukpɔɠaaleʋezu,
